title: Wage and salary of U.S. employees , by industry 2018
yAxis: Wage and salary in U.S. dollars
summary: This is a bar chart representing Industry in the x axis and Wage and salary in U.S. dollars in the y axis.
Industry Management of companies and enterprises has the highest Wage and salary in U.S. dollars and Accommodation and food services has the lowest Wage and salary in U.S. dollars.
The highest Industry Management of companies and enterprises has 100374.0 more Wage and salary in U.S. dollars than the lowest Industry Accommodation and food services.

max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Industry in the x axis and Wage and salary in U.S. dollars in the y axis.
Industry Management of companies and enterprises has the highest Wage and salary in U.S. dollars and Accommodation and food services has the lowest Wage and salary in U.S. dollars.
Industry Information has the second highest value for Wage and salary in U.S. dollars.
The difference of Wage and salary in U.S. dollars between the highest and lowest Industry is 100374.0.

Industry Management of companies and enterprises is higher than any other Industrys with value 130777.0, followed by Information, and Utilities. Down to Industry Accommodation and food services with the lowest value 30403.0.
The average Wage and salary in U.S. dollars in all 22 Industrys is 71927.36.
Summing up the values of all Industrys, we get total 1582402.0.
